languages.text: "Опасаясь, как бы хищнические интересы Касбаллики не подвергли опасности вашу казну, я предпринял собственное расследование. Вполне оправдано было подозревать некий сговор между Хейдари и Пощадой, и они действительно оказались связаны. Именно у его помощников я и приобрел компрометирующие Хейдари сведения".

"Fearing that the predatory interests of the Kasballica would pose a threat to your coffers, I began my own investigation. It was entirely reasonable to suspect collusion of some kind between Heydari and Mercy, and so my suspicions were confirmed — the two were connected. It was from Mercy's associates that I acquired the compromising intelligence on Heydari."
languages.original_text: "Опасаясь, как бы хищнические интересы Касбаллики не подвергли опасности вашу казну, я предпринял собственное расследование. Вполне оправдано было подозревать некий сговор между Хейдари и Пощадой, и они действительно оказались связаны. Именно у его помощников я и приобрел компрометирующие Хейдари сведения".

It was entirely reasonable to suspect collusion of some kind between Heydari and Mercy, and so my suspicions were confirmed — the two were connected. It was from Mercy's associates that I acquired the compromising intelligence on Heydari."

"Fearing that the predatory interests of the Kasballica would pose a threat to your coffers, I began my own investigation. It was entirely reasonable to suspect collusion of some kind between Heydari and Mercy, and so my suspicions were confirmed — the two were connected. It was from Mercy's associates that I acquired the compromising intelligence on Heydari."

It was entirely reasonable to suspect collusion of some kind between Heydari and Mercy, and so my suspicions were confirmed — the two were connected. It was from Mercy's associates that I acquired the compromising intelligence on Heydari."

"Fearing that the predatory interests of the Kasballica would pose a threat to your coffers, I began my own investigation. It was entirely reasonable to suspect collusion of some kind between Heydari and Mercy, and so my suspicions were confirmed — the two were connected. It was from Mercy's associates that I acquired the compromising intelligence on Heydari."

languages.text: “我担心支付卡斯巴利卡犯罪集团这么一大笔酬劳，可能会对您的国库构成威胁，于是我便进行了调查。在当时的情况下，怀疑海达利与悯慈之间存在某种勾结，也是合情合理的做法，而我的怀疑也得到了证实。这两个人之前确实有联系，我正是从悯慈的同伙那里，获得了关于海达利的机密情报。”
languages.original_text: "Fearing that the predatory interests of the Kasballica would pose a threat to your coffers, I began my own investigation. It was entirely reasonable to suspect collusion of some kind between Heydari and Mercy, and so my suspicions were confirmed — the two were connected. It was from Mercy's associates that I acquired the compromising intelligence on Heydari."

traits.locale_text: “我担心支付卡斯巴利卡犯罪集团这么一大笔酬劳，可能会对您的国库构成威胁，于是我便进行了调查。在当时的情况下，怀疑海达利与悯慈之间存在某种勾结，也是合情合理的做法，而我的怀疑也得到了证实。这两个人之前确实有联系，我正是从悯慈的同伙那里，获得了关于海达利的机密情报。”

languages.text: 「カスバリカの略奪的な利益が、あなたの財源に脅威を与えることを恐れた私は、独自に調査を始めたのだ。ヘイダリとマーシーの癒着を疑うのは至って合理的な判断だったと思うが、さらに私の疑念は確信に変わった…2人は繋がっていたのだ。私がヘイダリに関する情報を得たのは、マーシーの仲間からだ」
languages.original_text: "Fearing that the predatory interests of the Kasballica would pose a threat to your coffers, I began my own investigation. It was entirely reasonable to suspect collusion of some kind between Heydari and Mercy, and so my suspicions were confirmed — the two were connected. It was from Mercy's associates that I acquired the compromising intelligence on Heydari."

traits.locale_text: 「カスバリカの略奪的な利益が、あなたの財源に脅威を与えることを恐れた私は、独自に調査を始めたのだ。ヘイダリとマーシーの癒着を疑うのは至って合理的な判断だったと思うが、さらに私の疑念は確信に変わった…2人は繋がっていたのだ。私がヘイダリに関する情報を得たのは、マーシーの仲間からだ」

languages.text: «Temiendo que los intereses depredadores de la Kasballica podían suponer una amenaza para sus arcas, inicié mi propia investigación. Era completamente razonable supones que Heydari y Mercy estaban colaborando y efectivamente confirmé mis sospechas: había contactos entre las dos partes. Gracias a los socios de Mercy, obtuve información comprometedora sobre Heydari».
languages.original_text: "Fearing that the predatory interests of the Kasballica would pose a threat to your coffers, I began my own investigation. It was entirely reasonable to suspect collusion of some kind between Heydari and Mercy, and so my suspicions were confirmed — the two were connected. It was from Mercy's associates that I acquired the compromising intelligence on Heydari."

traits.locale_text: «Temiendo que los intereses depredadores de la Kasballica podían suponer una amenaza para sus arcas, inicié mi propia investigación. Era completamente razonable supones que Heydari y Mercy estaban colaborando y efectivamente confirmé mis sospechas: había contactos entre las dos partes. Gracias a los socios de Mercy, obtuve información comprometedora sobre Heydari».

languages.text: « Craignant que les intérêts carnassiers de la Kasballica menacent vos coffres, j'ai mené ma propre enquête. C'est tout naturellement que j'ai soupçonné une forme d'entente entre Heydari et Mercy, et mes doutes se sont trouvés confirmés : il existe bien un lien entre eux deux. C'est grâce aux associés de Mercy que j'ai pu obtenir ces informations compromettantes sur Heydari. »
languages.original_text: "Fearing that the predatory interests of the Kasballica would pose a threat to your coffers, I began my own investigation. It was entirely reasonable to suspect collusion of some kind between Heydari and Mercy, and so my suspicions were confirmed — the two were connected. It was from Mercy's associates that I acquired the compromising intelligence on Heydari."

traits.locale_text: « Craignant que les intérêts carnassiers de la Kasballica menacent vos coffres, j'ai mené ma propre enquête. C'est tout naturellement que j'ai soupçonné une forme d'entente entre Heydari et Mercy, et mes doutes se sont trouvés confirmés : il existe bien un lien entre eux deux. C'est grâce aux associés de Mercy que j'ai pu obtenir ces informations compromettantes sur Heydari. »

languages.text: "Da ich befürchtete, dass die räuberischen Interessen der Kasballica eine Bedrohung für Eure Kassen werden könnten, habe ich eigenständig eine Untersuchung durchgeführt. Der Verdacht auf geheime Absprache zwischen Heydari und Mercy lag sehr nahe und dieser bestätigte sich dann auch – zwischen beiden existierte eine Verbindung. Einer von Mercys Partnern spielte mir die kompromittierenden Informationen bezüglich Heydari zu."
languages.original_text: "Fearing that the predatory interests of the Kasballica would pose a threat to your coffers, I began my own investigation. It was entirely reasonable to suspect collusion of some kind between Heydari and Mercy, and so my suspicions were confirmed — the two were connected. It was from Mercy's associates that I acquired the compromising intelligence on Heydari."

traits.locale_text: "Da ich befürchtete, dass die räuberischen Interessen der Kasballica eine Bedrohung für Eure Kassen werden könnten, habe ich eigenständig eine Untersuchung durchgeführt. Der Verdacht auf geheime Absprache zwischen Heydari und Mercy lag sehr nahe und dieser bestätigte sich dann auch – zwischen beiden existierte eine Verbindung. Einer von Mercys Partnern spielte mir die kompromittierenden Informationen bezüglich Heydari zu."

languages.text: "Kasballica'nın aç gözlü niyetlerinin, sahibi olduğunuz hazineler için bir tehdit oluşturabileceğinden korktuğum için şahsi bir inceleme başlattım. Heydari ve Merhamet arasında bir çeşit danışıklık olduğundan şüphelenmek son derece akla yatkındı ve şüphelerim doğru çıktı, ikisi bağlantılıymış. Heydari hakkındaki kapsamlı bilgiyi Merhamet'in iş yaptığı kişilerden elde ettim."
languages.original_text: "Fearing that the predatory interests of the Kasballica would pose a threat to your coffers, I began my own investigation. It was entirely reasonable to suspect collusion of some kind between Heydari and Mercy, and so my suspicions were confirmed — the two were connected. It was from Mercy's associates that I acquired the compromising intelligence on Heydari."
